22.eng-name: Oaths and Vows (Kitab Al-Aiman Wa Al-Nudhur)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ka'b ibn Malik: I said: Messenger of Allah, to make my atonement complete I should divest myself of my all property as sadaqah (alms) for Allah and His apostle. He said: No. I said: The half of it. He said: No. I said: Then a third of it. He said: Yes. I said: I shall retain the portion I have at Khaybar

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ نَذَرَ أَنْ يَتَصَدَّقَ بِمَالِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The One Who Vows To Give His Wealth In Charity
